Name: Time Gun / 时间枪
About the game: Time Gun is a first person puzzle-platform video game. Players control the 'time status' of an object with a time gun. The goal of the game is to use the time gun to maneuver through the test chambers in order to complete the experiments. Features include: Unique game mechanisms: time stopping bullet and time rewinding bullet. Unique game maps: Mobius map, trefoil knot map and more... Time stopping bullet: the stopping time could be accumulated. One bullet equals 1 second. Time rewinding bullet: the rewinding time could be accumulated. One bullet equals 1 second.
